Race.Name: Tiefling
Race.Description: Burn your foes with Infernal flames as a charismatic Tiefling! Tieflings are touched with the power of Infernals. They excel in a variety of roles, including Warlocks, Favored Souls, and Sorcerers, and start with a bonus to Charisma.

Feat.Name: Past Life: Tiefling
Feat.Description: You were a Tiefling in a previous life Tier1: +1 Spellcraft Tier2: +1 Charisma Tier3: +1 Racial Tree Action point
